resources.string: WU Killa Quiz

Yes
No

No! Cappadonna is not an original member of the Wu-Tang Clan.
RZA is the right answer boy...
Yes! They collaborate with Snoop Dogg at \"The W\" 2000 released!
The right answers are Ghostface Killah and Method Man!
